comments: I'm so in love with this song

comments.@maxe_mini: This song reminds me of a good friend I was in a relationship with for 3 years. We ended it amicably, we both knew it wasn't going to work out in the future, and we didn't want to end up hurting each other in the long run. We still talk, we still laugh, we still have our inside jokes, it's just that now there's that small bit of distance between us that's never been there, a hesitation between every wave and every joke. All those memories between us, that intimacy and history, I wonder where it all goes? We don't talk much about how we were anymore, because it still hurts. It hurts, and sometimes I wish it could've worked out, sometimes I wonder if we still have a chance, but in the end, this is how it is, and realistically we really shouldn't be together. I'll just have to deal with this slightly cold morning, and hope that he's dealing with it well too.

description: In ielts listening test video, we are providing you with a listening practice test in order to help you prepare for the IELTS Listening Test 2024. This pract...

comments.@mehulkainth3856: 23 this'll quite easy to kill me if appears in final test. OMG god bless dear!

comments.@bvinodhraj: 35/40 - good and tough one to get trained. nice work team. :)

comments.@bvinodhraj: I scored 37. Seems, I have started cracking doing good. :) Thanks, this is very good test after a long time

comments.@dipalipawar18: Is it the level of difficulty of an actual ielts test? I am going to fail miserably then...

comments.@rohini12393: Does somebody want to practice the speaking module with me?

comments.@user-nn9cu9rn8z: How 12 answer is C . Isn't it D?

comments.@metinsen6463: this was hard 30 correct answers mean 35

comments.@noxyshezi9678: 34/40. Q40 i wrote applicants, is it wrong?

comments.@VidhiLakhani-gr6ds: 28 out of 40, could not get answer for 20 and 40

subtitles: No subtitles available for this video id 1C4wrykB1uc.

title: JVKE - golden hour (official music video)
description: It was just 2 lovers, Sittin in the car Listening to BlondeFallin for eachotherpink & orange skies,Feelin super childishNo donald glover Missed call from my ...

comments.@ivarandresosorio6461: This song's my wife, I'll be dying soon, terminal disease, and this song means my wife to me, she's the world, and more, light, life, everything, I hope in the future when I'm gone, this song reminds her how much I loved her. Thanks for this song man, it means a lot.

comments.@_mytrauma_: There's something about this piano rhythm that keeps pulling me back to hear this again and again.

comments.@JaydonCarlson: She showed me this song just a week before we broke up. I still listen to it, and get teary-eyed every time. thank you JVKE, for this masterpiece

comments.@Jnnose: I used to be a fan, but after hearing this masterpiece, I'm a whole air conditioner

comments.@TheS.H.I.E.L.D:
At a point in my life I had depression and wanted to end it all but this song randomly came on in one of my stupid depression playlists and I was just listening to it and all of the sudden I went from crying in sadness to crying with pure joy,w wonder and happiness 

This song pretty much cured my depression 

Thank you JVKE

comments: This is his golden hour! Excellent video!

comments.@BentRoads: It has to be more than an accident that I stumbled on to your video. My son was a piano player and looked JUST like you. Same head, shoulders, back, hands, and style of music. Even his name was the same as yours (but spelled Jake). He died 2 years ago and I've been praying for a sign that his spirit is alive and in a good place. Out of nowhere your video shows up on my screen. Could you be a messenger from God telling me all is well with my son? I believe so. Your song could easily be about the love and beauty that is said to be in heaven. I have been profoundly moved and enormously grateful that you showed up. Thank you Jvke. How amazing it must be to be used by the Almighty!

comments.@Pete379Xra: This is coming from a 66 year old truck driver and very rough around the edges, I donâ€™t know who you are but I stumbled onto this song on YouTube. Young man, itâ€™s an amazing tune. Amazing talent

comments.@Thequeenkatz: Music isnâ€™t made like this anymore. True art, talent and genius. Beautiful.

comments.@donaldphillips2648: Iâ€™m a 75 year old musician and I played for years trying to come up with something like this.  But Iâ€™m not discouraged!  There are musicians like me and there are musicians like you.  I represent the many who love music and keep it alive.  You sir represent the talent that takes music to new levels and give the world reason to cry with joy knowing thereâ€™s reason to love it again and again.  Weâ€™ll done sir, weâ€™ll done!!

comments.@beacollymore:
I donâ€™t know how to express my feelings right now. Iâ€™m just so emotional, a lot of tears falling from my eyes. 
I feel something so pure in this song. I feel peace and joy, I feel God in this song. 
One of the most beautiful melodies I ever heard in my life. 
May God bless your hands, your voice & everything you do, Jvke. You are rare to find.

comments.@milemuncher678: Songs like these are so rare to get released these days..ï¸

comments.@jenb3940: This song...... My God the immense amount of emotion I get from it is nearly indescribable

comments.@afro-es: no curse words, no explicit topics, just pure vibes & talent

comments.@keiko-k2u: This song gives me the feeling of standing in a field of flowers and butterflies. It's absolutely a masterpiece

comments.@lakshyarajput2854: no vulgarity no extra spicing , this is true art being respected the way it should be! thanks for this beauty jvke

comments.@KayleyCarrenton: Jvke, when this came out I was homeless, in and out of jail, and unhealthy. Now I have a house, a good job, and a husband. This song and "Clover Cage - Summer Of Love" are the two songs that helped overcome my depression. I just want everyone to know things do get better, and they will! We are in this together. I love you

comments.@sailersun1729: Not only can he sing, but he can play piano AND heâ€™s absolutely gorgeous. Heâ€™s literally perfect. Heâ€™s become one of my favorite music artists, I love his style with the violin and piano. I canâ€™t find many artists that use that combo that I actually like. My favorite part by far is when you hear the violin and her laughter in the background. Itâ€™s so beautiful and really has all these emotions in just those few seconds

comments.@trufflegallow1978: I got goosebumps listening to this song for the first time. The instrument, the lyrics and his voice is magical.

comments.@andrewmiller9265: I'm almost 40 years old and I absolutely love the song. It's nice and refreshing to see that the younger generations are still making amazing music. Couldn't get this song out of my head I sing it to my daughter all the time she loves it

comments.@Cdineee824:
It was 6:47pm when I realized that it was time to say goodbye to you, my first baby, my daughter. I remember just sitting in the bathroom, having contractions, bleeding. The physical pain was nothing, but the emotional pain of losing you was unbearable. Then I played this song, and when it got to the part that says â€œI donâ€™t need no light to see you shine,â€ I broke down in tears knowing that our Heavenly God is keeping you safe now in His hands. I love you my daughter, and even though 13 weeks was all I had to carry you, I am honored and extremely blessed, that God had chosen me to be your mother. 

Thank you JVKE, for this song has gotten me through my darkest night.

comments.@JohnDeaux161: itâ€™s rare to find someone like jake were itâ€™s so clear that his passion for music just oozes out of him. consider yourself lucky if youâ€™re ever that passionate about anything

comments.@Sm00th89:
First time I heard this song I choked up a bit. It made me think about all the memories me and my gf had for the past 10 years. This weekend I'll be proposing to her and I'll be playing this song as I'm waiting and she's walking down the stairs. Wish me luck guys! 

Edit : What a night!
SHE SAID YES! 
Thank you guys for the Love ï¸

comments.@OntarioCubing: Today a year ago, I was diagnosed with stage 2 cancer, they thought i would die in 30 days, and when day 30 arrived, i thought i would never see the sun again,  but after months of chemo,  I recovered and I'm getting better each day This song means a lot to me. I'm fully recovered and i remember those harsh days fighting cancer and i would listen to this song before chemo.

comments.@luqmanofficial157: The opening of Golden Hour has gotta be one of the best piano renditions ive heard in a while fr

comments.@Muichirooo: I canâ€™t even imagine how proud your family is..all your songs are a work of art

comments.@NtsBunny365: Got a goosebumps every time the chorus starts. Beautiful song

comments.@MF-lx8ps: The part â€œsheâ€™s got glow on her face,that glorious look in her eyesâ€ is just

comments.@bellamusicmaniac9755: There is just something so magical and spectacular about this song that I canâ€™t explain, but makes me feel everything all at once and I love it

comments.@jacquelinequintanilla5437: This feels like a classical song but with words, touching, unexplainable. I donâ€™t know how to feel but I do know i canâ€™t stop listening and I love it.

comments.@harbingerofdoom2185: No matter how many times I play this song. EVERY SINGLE TIME, I get GOOSEBUMPS ALL OVER. beautiful man. Just beautiful.

comments.@agirlfromjersey:
Not a lot of music moves me to tears, but this one does. 

This song is magic.

comments.@hiding_behind: the feeling everytime i hear the chorus is unexplainable

comments.@isaactullis3811: This song needed no music video because of the beauty and the power it had in its lyrics, but you gave one to us, and it made it even better! AMAZING work, JVKE! Love you, bro!

comments.@K-pop-stan16y: It's really a rare song that's incredibly well done.

comments.@JF-ev7xg: This really is the most beautiful, emotion evoking song Iâ€™ve ever heard
